description: Situated in the heart of town, this secluded, busy and welcoming wine bar serves delicious Piedmontese dishes and a good selection of wines by the glass, chosen from the well-stocked wine cellar on a daily basis. House specialities include braised beef in a Barbera Colli Tortonesi sauce and gianduia chocolate semifreddo with mascarpone cream.
facilitiesServices: Air conditioning, Interesting wine list, Terrace
